zh.title: N7線推行雙向分段收費
zh.content: 絲巴自2025年12月10日起，於N7綫新增雙向分段收費，讓深宵往返市中心、卡城與維拉的乘客享有更靈活的選擇。詳情請前往路線頁面並選擇N7。

en.title: N7 Implements Two-way Sectional Fare
en.content: From 10 December 2025, StarTone Transport implements two-way sectional fares on route N7, providing more flexible fare options for passengers travelling between Downtown, Katadelpia and Vayler at overnight. Refer to route page and select N7 for details.
